description_en:
**Adidas Pro Invisible Men Spray 150ml** is an effective antiperspirant spray with a gentle, vegan formula. It provides long-lasting protection of up to 48 hours against sweat and odour. Dermatologically tested and ideal for daily use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Adidas Pro Invisible Men Spray 150ml**:
â­ Shake well.
â­ Hold can 15cm from the body and spray.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Adidas Pro Invisible Men Spray 150ml**:
â­ Butane-Isobutane-Propane
â­ C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate
â­ Isododecane
â­ Aluminum Chlorohydrate
â­ Parfum/Fragrance
â­ Diisopropyl Adipate
â­ Neopentyl Glycol Diheptanoate
â­ Disteardimonium Hectorite
â­ Propylene Carbonate
